basics.name: Julie Dubois
basics.label: Digital analyst / front-end developer / graphic designer
basics.summary: In the graphic and multimedia industry mainly in the web world, I evolve as a graphic designer / web designer / front-end developer like a chameleon. Passionate about new technologies, I am constantly looking for ways to improve and gain in efficiency in projects, whether through a new tool or a new way of working.

work.name: Positive Thinking Company
work.position: Digital analyst (Mobile squad) @ BNP Paribas Fortis
work.achievements: Work in a different role, changing my mind from dev to marketing...
work.what: BNP Paribas Fortis is the Belgian bank of the BNP Paribas group, mainly active in the retail and corporate market in Belgium
highlights: Analysing data and formulating strategic advice
Create tagging plan and report for new or updated features
Performing different analyses as part of continual improvement on the basis of quantitative, qualitative and usability analytics, as well as processing and visualising data

work.name: Positive Thinking Company
work.position: Webmaster / Conversion rate optimization & Customer Journey expert @ MediaMarkt
work.skills: HTML - SASS - JavaScript - Fact-finder - Google Tag Manager - Google analytics
work.achievements: Work in an international team, learn fast new skills and improvise a lot of creative solutions in a locked working environment
work.what: MediaMarkt, is a German store chain specializing in consumer electronics and household appliances, number 1 in Europe
highlights: A/B test and data driven decision to optimise the conversion rate & customer journey
Analyse the global user experience across different entry point on the website (homepage, landing page, category page)
Work together with business and IT teams (make the bridge between the two, with focus on Business)
Help the frontend team. Advise on development, coach and support where needed.
Manage the website with a custom CMS and a catalog manager for the listing of product

work.name: Positive Thinking Company
work.achievements: Learn a new workflow with development servers only accessible by SSH and a huge use of git
work.skills: HTML - SASS - Bootstrap - Javascript - PHP - Twig - Git - Scrum - Jira
work.what: Pickx is the Proximus media platform available on the Internet
highlights: Pickx is the media platform of Proximus, my role was for Pickx on the web, it is the content of the TV but also dedicated content like articles on various categories (sport, tv, culture), streaming live of festivals, contests. Each page is created dynamically based on different feeds of data so it was never possible to know in advance what will look the page, for example a simple article with a picture and text and a complex page with images, text, video, a table of score ... use the same template. I was in charge to create and update the different template and element of the web application in a way to be reusable in every context.

work.name: Positive Thinking Company
work.achievements: Working for 2 teams and managing to keep the deadlines
work.skills: HTML - SASS - Foundation 5 - Javascript - Razor - Magnolia CMS - Git - Scrum - Jira
work.what: Proximus is a telecommunications service provider (Mobile, TV, Internet, fixed line) and also offers the purchase of linked products.
highlights: Proximus.be: Proximus is constantly adapting the design of the website, for that there is a custom-made library of HTML/css elements. The role was to update the library with the new design so it’s applied everywhere in one shot and also creating new elements. I also update structural components like for example the header, the goal was to make the JavaScript work with each different version (10 versions). A new requirement was also to make the website for people with disabilities, so we also update the library to make it WAI compliant.

Proximus webshop: based on the requirements of a user experience expert and a designer, the order flow needed to be recreated. It is a dynamic form, which is transformed for each client according to their needs and technical criteria. At the front-end development level, it was necessary to create a structure capable of adapting to each variant and visually easy to understand.

Technical analysis and testing of solutions developed for new web applications
Creation of an innovative concept using the Engie box as well as various smart objects (watch, Sonos, Philips Hue) in order to create personalized atmospheres

courses: Fundamental R programming skills, Statistical concepts such as probability, inference, and modelling and how to apply them in practice, Gain experience with the tidyverse, including data visualisation with ggplot2 and data wrangling with dplyr, Become familiar with essential tools for practising data scientists such as Unix/Linux, git and GitHub, and RStudio, Implement machine learning algorithms, In- depth knowledge of fundamental data science concepts through motivating real-world case studies
Project management methodologies, Technical analysis with UML 2.0, Project monitoring methodology with Agile and SCRUM, IT project management, Service and resource management with ITIL
Visual creation with Modul8 software and Resolume Avenue
Flash video animation training, dynamic application creation, ActionScript 3: object oriented

certificates.name: Become A Conversion Rate Optimization (CRO) Expert
Expert SEO
certificates.issuer: Certification Expert SEO de l'association SEO Camp

references.name: Prisca Bothy
references.reference: Le grand atout de Julie est qu'elle dispose d'un profil complet en Web Design et Developpement. De plus, elle maîtrise les différentes techniques de référencement ce qui lui permet de créer un site web de A à Z et d'en assurer une visibilité optimale.

references.name: Dimitri Mallié
references.reference:
Julie est le parfait "Couteau Suisse" du web. Du Graphisme au SEO en passant par l'intégration, elle est capable de réaliser et gérer un projet Web dans son intégralité.

Avide d'apprendre, elle est toujours à l'écoute et prête à s'auto-former. C'est toujours aussi la première pour aider ses collègues.
